description.desc: When we talk about information protection, we mean the safeguarding of data and information systems against unauthorised access, use, disclosure
Confidentiality: involves in maintaning authorised constraints on access and disclosure, as well as safeguards for personal privacy and priviledged data.
Integrity: which involves assuring information nonrepudiatuin and authenticity, is protecting against incorrect information
Availability: to provide quick and dependable access to and use of information
